001package edu.cnm.deepdive.codebreaker.service;
002
003import androidx.annotation.NonNull;
004import androidx.annotation.Nullable;
005import androidx.room.Database;
006import androidx.room.RoomDatabase;
007import androidx.room.TypeConverter;
008import androidx.room.TypeConverters;
009import androidx.sqlite.db.SupportSQLiteDatabase;
010import edu.cnm.deepdive.codebreaker.model.dao.GameResultDao;
011import edu.cnm.deepdive.codebreaker.model.dao.UserDao;
012import edu.cnm.deepdive.codebreaker.model.entity.GameResult;
013import edu.cnm.deepdive.codebreaker.model.entity.User;
014import edu.cnm.deepdive.codebreaker.service.CodebreakerDatabase.Converters;
015import java.time.Duration;
016import java.time.Instant;
017
018@Database(entities = {User.class, GameResult.class}, version = 1)
019@TypeConverters({Converters.class})
020public abstract class CodebreakerDatabase extends RoomDatabase {
021
022  public static final String NAME = "codebreaker_results";
023
024  CodebreakerDatabase() {
025    // Avoid generation of Javadoc HTML.
026  }
027
028  public abstract GameResultDao getGameResultDao();
029
030  public abstract UserDao getUserDao();
031
032  public static class Converters {
033
034    @TypeConverter
035    @Nullable
036    public static Long toLong(@Nullable Instant value) {
037      return (value != null) ? value.toEpochMilli() : null;
038    }
039
040    @TypeConverter
041    @Nullable
042    public static Instant toInstant(@Nullable Long value) {
043      return (value != null) ? Instant.ofEpochMilli(value) : null;
044    }
045
046    @TypeConverter
047    @Nullable
048    public static Long toLong(@Nullable Duration value) {
049      return (value != null) ? value.toMillis() : null;
050    }
051
052    @TypeConverter
053    @Nullable
054    public static Duration toDuration(@Nullable Long value) {
055      return (value != null) ? Duration.ofMillis(value) : null;
056    }
057
058  }
059
060  public static class Callback extends RoomDatabase.Callback {
061
062    @Override
063    public void onCreate(@NonNull SupportSQLiteDatabase db) {
064      super.onCreate(db);
065      // Include code to pre-populate.
066    }
067
068    @Override
069    public void onOpen(@NonNull SupportSQLiteDatabase db) {
070      super.onOpen(db);
071      // Include code for automatic, infrequent update.
072    }
073  }
074
075}
